name: Simple Slider
author: MyWebsiteAdvisor, ChrisHurst

sections.description:
Simple Slider Plugin for WordPress allows creation and management of simple image slideshows

Developer Website: http://MyWebsiteAdvisor.com/

Plugin Page: http://MyWebsiteAdvisor.com/tools/wordpress-plugins/simple-slider/

sections.installation:
1. Upload simple-slider/ to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Go to Simple Slider Plugin settings and enable Simple Slider Plugin.
